data.text: @soxallday15 @neontaster oh, I am aware of that. I wasn't referring to myself.
@trgray14 @neontaster What are the stats on long covid?
@neontaster Are these US data? I believe the skew is shifted even more elderly in Europe.
@BlofeldSchwab @trgray14 @neontaster So not having COVID is the main risk factor for long COVID in that age group.

@Spear_Owl @neontaster @snorman1776 We knew. Everyone who was reading any kind of source material knew. 

And yet…… the farce ……. continues for many.

@neontaster 1st job of any journalist is to put info in context and not lose sight of that context. Nearly every journalist utterly failed at that 1 job for the past 2 years. This was known in Feb 2020, which is why I recommended our school go to Disneyland as planned on 3/6/20. Great trip.

@Ligmatic1 @neontaster We are all going to be able to bond over the abject stupidity of this pandemic response sooner than I expected. I was afraid it wld take a few more years but it’s all coming out. Fauci is no longer assaulting us daily, which is alone a big life improvement.
